website_summaries.verdict: As a testament to the lasting appeal of the Chuck Taylor All Star High Tops, these are still as popular today as they were a century ago. Boasting extreme versatility regarding functionality and style, their well-made construction ensures lasting quality.The affordable price tag along with the street style cred of the Chucks guarantee that the classic silhouette is here to stay for perhaps many generations more.
pros: According to a very good number of reviewers, the Converse Chuck Taylor All Star High Tops’ design can tie your whole outfit together and make any streetwear look stylish
Some have added that the shoes provide a good look for any age or gender
The high-top sneakers are comfortable and versatile, many people have reported
Several have mentioned that these are great for kicking around in, working out, and skateboarding
Several purchasers have noted that the colorways of the Chuck Taylor All Star High Tops looked rich and exactly as they did on website pictures
The high-top Converse sneakers provide a good fit width-wise for people with narrow to wide feet, some testers have remarked
The classic Converse Chuck Taylor All Star High Tops have an affordable price, according to a handful of buyers’ comments
A few users have written that the retro silhouette is durable and, one user recounted, his first pair lasted him years
A couple of consumers have stated that the Chuck Taylor All Star High Tops are easy to clean off and, with proper care, will look new every time you wash them
Two customers have mentioned in their reviews that the Converse silhouette is light and breathable
cons: These high-top sneakers from Converse have flat and not very flexible soles, several users have said
Some have added that the shoes also do not have any arch support so cushioned inserts may be in order

customer_reviews.title: I love my converse baseball boots I do
customer_reviews.text: I love my converse baseball boots I do,ideal for those summer months(where as the summer gone?and can we find it?)these are very comfy and feels like you're actually walking on air,and even sponged flooring too,feel so so nice,of course they do need wearing in a fair bit but after that?Hey they fit like a good glove,but gloves don't fit feet,have you seen anyone wearing gloves on their feet?and converse on their hands?well it's a good job you haven't seen me isn't it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: AdeTheAde

customer_reviews.title: I Will throw them to the rubbish
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this model for 20 years, different colors but always the same model and number. Well, this is the first time I've been hurt in the feet, specifically in the little fingers. It's painful and I've tried several times because I've never had problems with this model, but this time I can't use them, I'll throw them to the rubbish Maybe it's a manufacturer's fault or I don't know, but I won't buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Pooleak

customer_reviews.title: Good old converse.
customer_reviews.text: Good shoes, always liked them, BUT, the way I walk, I must put my toes down first, and the rubber splits from the fabric at the front, so they didn't last long and I do not wear converse high tops any more. Apart from that, they are great quality canvas shows, and very stylish! I would highly recommend that you buy a pair! If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic way to protect your feet during daily use
customer_reviews.text: - Wide range of colours & designs available. I bought the black ones. - Set of two shoes - one for each foot, left & right. - Lace-up design enables reliable attachment to foot. - Make sure to undo the laces before taking the shoes off or putting them on or you will struggle like some of the people who reviewed this product. - You should buy the size that fits your feet, so if you are a size 10 buy a size 10, size 11 buy size 11, etc. - Ideal for people like me who regularly pick objects up and put objects down. - They go really well with a pair of long socks.
customer_reviews.author: Desktop User

customer_reviews.title: CONVERSE Unisex-Adult Chuck Taylor All Star Core Hi Trainers
customer_reviews.text: Took absolutely AGES to arrive - was thinking of canx the order it was that long. Other then that usual Converse quality, fits well, not fake as some people seem to think lol - triple checked these against other pairs that I know are not fake. But with confidence, just leave a few weeks for delivery lol.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, partner very happy with them. As always with this brand, comfy. Come in box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing to dislike. Perfect fit, size 10 for me. I'm not always sure if I'm 43 or 44 in Eur size, but this is perfect and very comfortable. The tag on the heel will probably tear of from wear one day though. I wear heels quite fast for some reason. But I will probably buy this again when this pair will wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Yellow Moose

customer_reviews.title: Classic style, great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These are great arrived promptly good price. Quality as expected and in use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila S

customer_reviews.title: and these are the original and best, you can get similar a lot cheaper but ...
customer_reviews.text: Have worn converse for years, and these are the original and best, you can get similar a lot cheaper but the quality is no where near. Would be great if they offered a wider fitting version though as it takes a while for my wide toes to feel properly comfortable but I knew this before ordering.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The best...don't buy cheaper alternatives!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing Converse All Stars since I was a teenager, but the last pair of high tops I bought were a different brand that were cheaper. After a while, the heel came away from the canvas, and so they ended up in the bin. So this time I've gone back to Converse, and I will never buy a different brand again, as it is a false economy. These were also a great price and arrived on time.
customer_reviews.author: A. H. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: FAKE
customer_reviews.text: This product is fake. Not official and in no way real. If you want real converse. Do not buy these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hazmosis

customer_reviews.title: How to be a big hit with Grandsons.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for Grandson Number One, I know he no longer believes in Santa, but he thinks I am great because he had wanted a pair of these for a while, he was quite surprised when he opened them on Christmas morning. (either that or he is a good actor).
customer_reviews.author: Doeidea

customer_reviews.title: If you want to buy something poor quality that looks similar to Converse I'm sure you ...
customer_reviews.text: AVOID! I suspect these are fake. The Converse tag on the ankle smudged when it got wet and the quality was not what I would expect from Converse. If you want to buy something poor quality that looks similar to Converse I'm sure you can find cheaper knock offs elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S r McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Almost fifty percent cheaper than high street
customer_reviews.text: Awesome converse , the "S" on the "All Star" sign at the back of them was smudged , but apart from that these were almost fifty percent cheaper than the high street so no complaints
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fashion
customer_reviews.text: Nice and comfortable,pleasant change from full leather boots which I normally wear and a little more flexible than trainers and great value at discounted price.
customer_reviews.author: maxwall

customer_reviews.title: Not great. Doesn't fit properly even though the size is ...
customer_reviews.text: Not great. Doesn't fit properly even though the size is correct, the neck of the shoes do not accommodate your feet well when putting them on
customer_reviews.author: Muz

customer_reviews.title: look good and are comfy enough to wear all day
customer_reviews.text: Converse, reliable, look good and are comfy enough to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent as always I use for powerlifting and have tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as always I use for powerlifting and have tried other shoes but none cone close to matching this one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit.. this time! Take notice that, on some sizes, Amazon's size chart is not the same as the label. Size 10(uk) really is 44(eur) on the label. But size 9(uk) was 42.5(eur) on the label and not 43(eur) like it said on Amazon's size chart.
customer_reviews.author: Nuno Cruz

customer_reviews.title: converse allstar all star hi canvas black
customer_reviews.text: great just what our son wanted for christmas fitted just right sizing spot on wanted purple but sold out but happy with black
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Margaret Woollard

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son as a present and so far he hasn't any complaints about them so a good fit and nice looking trainer.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. C. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Sole detached after a short while of regular use, and had a smudged logo
customer_reviews.text: The sole came off after approx. 6 months of average wear. Not impressed. It came with a smudge on the Converse logo on one of the shoes. Comfort and fit wise, these are great.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: ... very tight fit had to sell them on very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: bought as a present had converse before but theses were a very tight fit had to sell them on very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: janet

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: First time I have bought shoes online as I normally prefer to try them on first, but very happy with them.

customer_reviews.title: Good fit snd good value (£30) was worried for awhile ...
customer_reviews.text: Good fit snd good value (£30) was worried for awhile that they were fake but having researched it I'm certain they are authentic. Love them

customer_reviews.title: Build to last
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son some time ago. He lives in them and they wear very well. He must have had this pair for two years by now and they are still respectable!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice shoes, , was a gift and they loved it :D

customer_reviews.text: Love these boots, worn 'em for most of my life. Still cool.

customer_reviews.title: so very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Been a while since I've been able to get some Converse, so very happy with them :)

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: My son's 3rd pair of converse all stars and they always have to be black. Great shoes and a great price.

customer_reviews.title: love them

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoes EVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable shoes ever! Very good for walking and have lasted very well. I have black high tops. I definitely recommend these especially if you do a lot of walking.

customer_reviews.text: great shoe and its a all outting shoe which its comfortable and fashonable wherever you are going ....great shoes though

customer_reviews.text: Didn't get any laces with them, and never got a response as to why: / was disappointed with lack of options to ask for assistance.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: A little thin near the end for me but is otherwise great and exactly what I paid for.

customer_reviews.title: converse chuck taylor hi
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about these trainers. Great for summer, Classic, beatiful, comfortable. Great! I Would buy them again for sure!!!

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable, they last for ages as long as you ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, they last for ages as long as you don't do ridiculous activities such as football, rock climbing or extreme sports :)

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A little on the bigger side but I just wear a little thicker socks to even things out

customer_reviews.text: As described. Fit as expected. Well packaged. Arrived on time.

customer_reviews.title: As can be expected from converse
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic pair of shoes that arrived in good time and in original packaging. Like all converse, comfy from the moment you put them on.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes! ^^
customer_reviews.text: 5 Stars, I love converse shoes. I take size 10 (44 EU) and these fit perfectly as expected : )

customer_reviews.title: Back to the 70s
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy. Never bought a pair in the 70's but glad that I have now finally got a pair. One word of warning these shoes may well not suit people with wide feet. I noticed that after a night out clubbing my feet felt a bit 'pinched'. Friends have commented that this is simply a common Converse problem. Anyway I like them.

product_meta.title: Converse Unisex Chuck Taylor All Star Canvas Hi-Top Trainers
product_meta.description: Please note: up to size 39 EU (UK 6) there are 7 eyelets and starting with size 40 EU (UK 7) there are 8 eyelets. Runs half large size.
feature_bullets: Shoe Width: Medium mens_us, Medium womens_us
